name: Railroads
description:
What is Railroads?
Developed by a team of two, a new adventure awaits for you in the Railroads.
Uncover the memories of a nomad who once travelled through an abandoned mine.
Every playthrough is designed to be placed differently thanks to random/procedural generation.

The Tracks
The Railroads are an endless trail of tracks. In the early stages, you face hordes of undead miners.
Contents of the tracks are changed as the player progresses throughout the story.
They are also the grounds for resourcing building before the player chooses to unlock the rooms.

Rooms
While the adventure down the tracks is infinite, you may come across restricted areas called rooms. Rooms are designed to be unique challenges for you to complete and offer story progression. Completing rooms unlocks more difficult rooms which reward you with higher tier content. After rooms are completed, they will also introduce new gameplay to the tracks. Most of the content in the rooms are arranged differently each save. Some rooms may contain special bosses which unlock new special equipment.
